fr.univnantes.lina.uima.util
Class AnalysisEngine

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent_ImplBase
      org.apache.uima.analysis_component.Annotator_ImplBase
          org.apache.uima.analysis_component.JCasAnnotator_ImplBase
              fr.univnantes.lina.uima.util.AnalysisEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.uima.analysis_component.AnalysisComponent
public class AnalysisEngine
extends org.apache.uima.analysis_component.JCasAnnotator_ImplBase

UIMA Analysis Engine abstract class

  • Perform some process on some annotations (also called InputAnnotation) covered by some others (also called ContextAnnotation) which are only present in some views (also called InputView).
  • Create a new view (also called OutputView) or a new annotation (also called OutputAnnotation) to receive the processing result.

The process has to be implemented (see the abstract method of the class).

The class is type system agnostic and so handle generically the views and the annotations you process. This is made possible by specifying the names of the handled views and annotations by parameters.

Author:
Nicolas Hernandez

process

public void process(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas aJCas)
             throws org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineProcessException
From the given JCas, process sequentially each InputView. Eventually may create a view with the concatenated results obtained for each view. Previously the method was intending to route toward the correct subprocess method depending on the InputType which is either Annotation or View. Recent modifications led to use the same subprocess method. Indeed the InputView will be processed indirectly by the DocumentAnnotation.

Specified by:
process in class org.apache.uima.analysis_component.JCasAnnotator_ImplBase
Parameters:
aJCas - the CAS over which the process is performed
inputViewString - [] List of names of each InputView to process
contextAnnotationStringArray - List of the Context Annotation names to process
inputAnnotationStringArray - List of Input Annotation names to process
inputFeatureString - Feature name of the inputAnnotation whose String Value will be actually processed
outputViewString - View name to consider as the view to receive the result; to be created whether `OutputAnnotation` is empty or simply to edit if `OutputAnnotation` is defined
outputViewTypeMimeString - Type Mime of the view to create
outputAnnotationString - Name of the annotation to create as the analysis result
ouputFeatureString - Feature name of the annotation whose string value will contain the analysis result
Throws:
org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineProcessException
See Also:
JCasAnnotator_ImplBase.process(JCas)

processInputView

protected java.lang.String processInputView(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas inputViewJCas,

                                            java.lang.String outputAnnotationString,
                                            java.lang.String ouputFeatureString)
                                     throws org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineProcessException
From the given inputView, process sequentially each ContextAnnotation. Returns the contatenated results obtained for each Context Annotation.

Parameters:
inputViewJCas - the CAS View over which the process is performed
contextAnnotationsFSIter - FSIterator of context Annotations
inputAnnotationStringHashMap - List of Input Annotation names to process
inputFeatureString - Feature name of the inputAnnotation whose String Value will be actually processed
outputViewJCas - the CAS View to update with potential future created annotations
outputAnnotationString - Name of the annotation to create as the analysis result
ouputFeatureString - Feature name of the annotation whose string value will contain the analysis result
Returns:
Contatenated results obtained for each Context Annotation
Throws:
org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineProcessException

processContextAnnotation

protected java.lang.String processContextAnnotation(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas inputViewJCas,
                                                    org.apache.uima.cas.FSIterator contextAnnotationsFSIter,
                                                    org.apache.uima.cas.FSIterator contextualizedInputAnnotationsFSIter,

                                                    java.lang.String outputAnnotationString,
                                                    java.lang.String ouputFeatureString)
                                             throws org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineProcessException
For a given ContextAnnotation, process each InputAnnotation by analyzing the value of its InputFeature If some OutputAnnotations are specified then they are created and their OutputFeature is set with the analysis result (Else) it returns the contatenated results obtained for each InputAnnotation

Parameters:
inputViewJCas - the CAS View over which the process is performed
contextualizedInputAnnotationsFSIter - FSIterator of the input Annotations to process
inputFeatureString - Feature name of the Input Annotations whose String Value will be actually processed
outputViewJCas - the CAS View to update with potential future created annotations
outputAnnotationString - Name of the annotation to create as the analysis result
ouputFeatureString - Feature name of the annotation whose string value will contain the analysis result
Returns:
the contatenated results obtained for each InputAnnotation
Throws:
org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineProcessException

processAnnotationFeatureStringValue

protected java.lang.String processAnnotationFeatureStringValue(org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas inputViewJCas,
                                                               java.lang.String inputTextToProcess,
                                                               int beginFeatureValue,
                                                               int endFeatureValue)
                                                        throws org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineProcessException
This method corresponds to the actual process to perform on the String Value of a given Feature of a given Annotation By default it echoes the text to process

Parameters:
inputViewJCas - the CAS view that will be processed.
inputTextToProcess - the text to process (actually it corresponds to the String Value of a given Feature of a given Annotation )
beginFeatureValue - the begin offset of the Annotation whose one Feature is going to be processed
endFeatureValue - the end offset of the Annotation whose one Feature is going to be processed
Returns:
the result of the performed processing
Throws:
org.apache.uima.analysis_engine.AnalysisEngineProcessException - if something wrong happened while processing this CAS view.
